page.title: 18CHERRY TREE
page.content: This privately owned children's home is situated at the bottom of Mickley Lane,on the edge of Totley. It houses 13 children at present,who are of various ages and live in the two family houses or in one of the bed sitters. They attend local schools or go to work. In their spare time some children attend local scouts or guides groups.A staff of eight women and one man care for the children, working in shifts.The children are taken on holidays and various trips and visits by the staff and community groups. Until their ship was sunk in the South Atlantic, the crew of H.M.S. Sheffield took a keen interest in Cherry Tree. There is a well equipped outdoor play area and a new gamesroom where the favourite game is Badminton. Bedtime is at 8.0pm for the younger and 11.0pm for the older children.When
